publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5737 Shona Robison: The Draft Community Care (Personal Care and Nursing Care) (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2010—That the Health and Sport Committee recommends that the draft Community Care (Personal Care and Nursing Care) (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2010 be approved. Supported by: Nicola Sturgeon*
